comment.body:
Apparently, it is the annoyance filter that blocks all mailpoet forms.

I get, why it would block the pop-up (although questionable on a newsletter website).
But blocking ALL mailpoet forms is simply insane. They even have very much distinguishable classes/IDs.

### Prerequisites

- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

3.6.11

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://status.katys.cf/

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard French filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, Online Malicious URL Blocklist, NoCoin Filter List

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

1. When the filter is disabled, a [`link[rel=manifest]`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Attributes/rel/manifest) element is present in the web page. But when the filter is enabled, the element is missing 

2. Screenshots

None (ask what kind you'd need if any, but I have no idea at first glance).

---

Thanks

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.1.53

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Yandex Browser

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://translate.yandex.ru/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Russian filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. При блокировке рекламы на сайте, блок рекламы исчезает, но структура сайта нарушается. Основные фреймы не по центру и аватарка сдвинута вправо.

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Выглядит вот так:</summary>

![Снимок экрана 2023-03-13 010703](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52073031/224704144-69c4a9ab-ea65-48ed-a119-c9ddef23af59.png)
</details>



<details><summary>Должно быть:</summary>

![Снимок экрана 2023-03-13 010733](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52073031/224704300-f77151a4-20d2-4128-98b8-fd16d4df0297.png)
</details>





### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
К прошлым сообщениям:

> У вас не показывается реклама даже если вы залогинены, как я вижу.

Яндекс Браузер на ряде сайтов запрещает/мешает блокировщикам рекламы (расширениям). Может здесь такой случайй? Я у себя не вижу рекламу при выключенном блокировщике.


Вот такое ещё проверьте
`@@translate.yandex.ru^$jsinject`
это менее широкое разблокирующее правило, чем предыдущее `@@translate.yandex.ru^$elemhide,urlblock,jsinject`

comment.body:
`AdGuard Annoyances filter` contains following filters:

- AdGuard Cookie Notices filter
- AdGuard Popups filter
- AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter
- AdGuard Other Annoyances filter
- AdGuard Widgets filter

You can enable the necessary only.
We block subsctiptions in `AdGuard Popups filter`. This is expected behavior. 
Btw Annoyances filters are not enabled by default.

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBO-1.47.4

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

`https://www.fullhdizle.me/the-unholy-izle-2021-full-hd2-hd/`

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Turkish filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1 - Pre-roll video

<details><summary>Screenshot</summary>

![resim](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/110184059/225280235-cb05a7f4-9091-4b27-a425-2a8331366e79.png)


</details>

comment.body:
Не повторяется с вашими настройками.
Попробуйте выключить и снова включить контент-блокеры в настройках Сафари, а также обновить фильтры Адгарда.
Важно не закрывать окно Адгарда при обновлении фильтров в течение ~60 секунд, иначе iOS прервёт процесс применения фильтров.

### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

3.6.11

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://status.katys.cf/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard French filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, Online Malicious URL Blocklist, NoCoin Filter List

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. When the filter is disabled, a [`link[rel=manifest]`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Attributes/rel/manifest) element is present in the web page. But when the filter is enabled, the element is missing 

2. Screenshots

None (ask what kind you'd need if any, but I have no idea at first glance).

---

Thanks

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: mail.yandex.ru
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.1.53

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://mail.yandex.ru

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Russian filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Block WebRTC, Hide Referrer from third-parties (specify in comment below, if used custom value)

### Add your comment and screenshots


 Пропали доп. кнопки внизу левой колонки интерфейса почты, в том числе такие полезные как: Журнал учёта посещений, выбор языка и др. Всему виной правило `mail.yandex.*#%#//scriptlet('abort-on-property-read', 'Object.prototype.adv')` в фильтре Раздражителей:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/AnnoyancesFilter/Other/sections/annoyances.txt#L2495

<details><summary>Как сейчас:</summary>

![2023 03 15-1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17948007/225341674-c26d1b2b-9041-40bb-9d93-6347c001b806.png)
</details>

<details><summary>Как надо:</summary>

![2023 03 15-2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17948007/225342002-8893fbda-07d5-45ab-a28e-c2d0a07d9e83.png)
</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Попробуйте отправить страницу еще раз, сохранив как single fil: 
1. Перейдите на страницу, которую хотите сохранить.
2. В правом верхнем углу экрана нажмите на значок "Ещё" --> Дополнительные инструменты --> Сохранить страницу как.
3. Укажите формат single file
4. Нажмите Сохранить
5. Отправьте файл на `filters@adguard.com` с номером issue в теме письма.

Please scan your system using [AdwCleaner](https://www.malwarebytes.com/adwcleaner/)

issue.title: AdGuard Annoyances blocks link[rel=manifest]
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

3.6.11

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://status.katys.cf/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard French filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, Online Malicious URL Blocklist, NoCoin Filter List

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. When the filter is disabled, a [`link[rel=manifest]`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Attributes/rel/manifest) element is present in the web page. But when the filter is enabled, the element is missing 

2. Screenshots

None (ask what kind you'd need if any, but I have no idea at first glance).

---

Thanks

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
I'm using `link[rel=manifest]` elements from a [userscript](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Userscript) to [detect a number of self-hostable webapps](https://git.kaki87.net/KaKi87/userscripts/src/branch/master/darkReaderDynamicBlacklist/main.user.js#L502) for which to programatically disable Dark Reader *([more info](https://git.kaki87.net/KaKi87/userscripts/src/branch/master/darkReaderDynamicBlacklist/README.md))*.

So, I could, indeed, manually add this counter-filter to my own configuration, but I can't ask all my userscript's users to do the same, instead I can tell them to use Fanboy's annoyances blocklist instead of AdGuard's, as it's much easier.

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

### Issue URL (Ads) [https://w.linovelib.com/novel/2/catalog](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fw.linovelib.com%2Fnovel%2F2%2Fcatalog) ### Comment > https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/36d878cd6679c061d7f608c5a9578c7f596b4379 > 这一commit移除了一条规则—— > "||pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js$script,redirect=noopjs,domain=linovelib.com" > ，导致只拦截了其中一个谷歌广告，另一个没有用document.createElement("script")，直接使用script标签嵌入的广告被放过了。这个页面使用google自动决定嵌入位置的功能，很卡。 > 重定向规则并不会产生error事件，所以放过的规则是没有必要的。 ### Screenshots

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.1.53

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://mail.yandex.ru

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Russian filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Block WebRTC, Hide Referrer from third-parties (specify in comment below, if used custom value)

### Add your comment and screenshots


 Пропали доп. кнопки внизу левой колонки интерфейса почты, в том числе такие полезные как: Журнал учёта посещений, выбор языка и др. Всему виной правило `mail.yandex.*#%#//scriptlet('abort-on-property-read', 'Object.prototype.adv')` в фильтре Раздражителей:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/AnnoyancesFilter/Other/sections/annoyances.txt#L2495

<details><summary>Как сейчас:</summary>

![2023 03 15-1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17948007/225341674-c26d1b2b-9041-40bb-9d93-6347c001b806.png)
</details>

<details><summary>Как надо:</summary>

![2023 03 15-2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17948007/225342002-8893fbda-07d5-45ab-a28e-c2d0a07d9e83.png)
</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: Нет, интерфейс обычный. Попробуй с отключённым AdGuard'ом пролистать левую колонку до конца и там, под рекламой, будет эта пачка кнопок. Но там, помимо тех, что на моём скрине, присутствуют ещё множество мусорных кнопок, которые я скрыл, например кнопки скачивания моб. приложений, устройства к ним на работу и т.д.

comment.body:
Uninstalling my personal vaccine (V3 365 Clinic) could the key of the solution.
I tried a lot of uninstalling and reinstalling the programs. For example, all VPN programs and all security programs (thanks to Hoax Eliminator v7.10).
The personal filter was always turned off.

As a result, the below websites are working well with Adguard v7.12 now.
- Tworld login
- watching high quality live streaming on 'sports.news.naver.com'

BTW, using V3 365 Clinic without Adguard hasn't had any problems regarding unstable access like this. 
Also, unchecking WPF opsion on Adguard was the only solution to fix the issue while I use the vaccine.

Above all things, I pay the fee for the vaccine yearly due to high quality from my country. So I hope I keep using it.
It's unfortunate that my country tend to avoid submiting report due to language difference or laziness. Various reports would be helpful for kind of this issue.

Some Korean are still suffer from using Adguard, because these problems: 
- Unchecking the WFP option on Adguard setting to solve the above problems even if they are anxious.
- Delay for 5~10 seconds right after opening the chrome browser.
- Using Adguard with V3 vaccine producted by Ahnlab company.


Thanks,

Dohun LEE
South Korea

### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://www.bloomberg.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bloomberg.com%2F) ### Comment > Dear AdGuard, > > I am writing to bring to your attention an issue that I have been experiencing with one of your products, particularly the ad blocking extension for Safari. > > Firstly, I would like to express my satisfaction with the extension, as it has been serving my needs for a considerable period of time, including on the Bloomberg website. However, I have noticed that after a recent update, the extension seems to be encountering some difficulties when used on the Bloomberg site. > > To be specific, the website loads a couple times, and then it goes blank white after a few seconds when the adguard is turned on. Upon inspection of the element inspector, I noticed that the site runs some CSS code that obstructs the display of the entire page when the adguard is turned on. The page then goes white, make it unusable. > > Moreover, when the adguard is turned off on the Bloomberg website, I tried to block the top element that was causing the empty white space (as shown in screenshot 1). However, the setting is not saved after reloading the website, even though I have everything saved in my custom rules that should remove the white space at the beginning of the page. > > As a loyal user of your products, I hope that you can address this issue as soon as possible. I look forward to a prompt resolution of this matter. Thank you for your excellent products. > > Yours sincerely, > Powers. ### Screenshots

issue.title: m.vk.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://m.vk.com/kinomania?from=group](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fm.vk.com%2Fkinomania%3Ffrom%3Dgroup) ### Comment > Суть ситуации: есть необходимость быстрого просмотра пабликов VK в браузере Яндекс без регистрации. При этом хочется убрать рекламу в пабликах, т.к. она не относится к нужному контенту и исключить назойливые плашки о регистрации. Сначала пробовал включить AdGuard в режим VPN, все работает замечательно - рекламы нет, раздражителей нет. Но при этом некоторые приложения на Android телефоне (Сбербанк, Wildberries), даже добавленные в исключения AdGuard, продолжают напоминать про VPN. Это тоже определенный раздражитель. В режиме локального HTTP прокси напоминаний про VPN нет, но "отваливается" DNS фильтр и AdGuard начинает пропускать рекламу и раздражители. Данная проблема присутствует и на других пабликах - "Киномания" просто приведена в качестве иллюстрации. В общем, добиться комфортной работы пока не удалось. ### Screenshots

comment.body: They put ads nearly everywhere. It normally shows up in the posts (as in the picture shown) and even when you are scrollint through the stories.
